info.name: Active Tab (matches Zune Theme Orange Color)
info.description: Based on "Tab: Colored Active Tab" I've modified to match the Zune Theme that you can download from Microsoft.  Works great with another one of my styles, "Hardly visible inactive tabs".

data.title: Very convenient to change colors, too. Thanks!
Unfortunately this style doesn't work under Firefo
